Arcane.Dragon: Summons an ancient force that scorches enemies with {debuffimg} lightning, freezes them with {debuffimg} ice, and curses them with {debuffimg} dark magic and {debuffimg} poison.

Arcane.Fire Gloves: Ignites your fists in blazing heat, delivering {debuffimg} fire damage with every strike.

Arcane.Meteor: Calls down a celestial inferno, burning foes with {debuffimg} fire and {debuffimg} lightning, while fueling your fury with {buffimg} rage.

Arcane.Freezing Water: Drenches foes in elemental torment with {debuffimg} water, {debuffimg} ice, and jolts of {debuffimg} lightning.

Arcane.Imperial Touch: A refined gesture heals the soul with {buffimg} vitals, {buffimg} dopamine, and {buffimg} wisdom.
Arcane.Mana Drain: Siphons arcane forces, empowering with {buffimg} lightning while weakening foes through {debuffimg} dark magic.

Nature.Ruined Sun: Unleashes the decaying wrath of the forest sun, searing enemies with {debuffimg} {fire} and electrifying them with {debuffimg} {lightning}. Also curses their souls with {debuffimg} {curse} and infuses them with dark decay via {debuffimg} {dark magic}.
Nature.Nature Call: Summons the primal force of the earth to empower allies with {buffimg} {rage}, {buffimg} {endurance}, and {buffimg} {vitals}. This rallying cry awakens the spirit of ancient trees and beasts.
Nature.Typhoon: A wild storm is conjured, lashing enemies with {debuffimg} {ice} and {debuffimg} {water}, while granting the caster {buffimg} {dopamine} through elemental exhilaration.
Nature.Snow Shuriken: Hurls razor-sharp snowflakes imbued with {debuffimg} {ice} and {debuffimg} {lightning}, slicing enemies with freezing precision.

Nature.Poisonous Mist: A cloud of venomous fog rolls in, weakening enemies with {debuffimg} {poison}, {debuffimg} {curse}, and {debuffimg} {dark magic}. Inhalation is perilous.

Nature.Dirt Golem: Summons a sturdy earthen construct to fight by your side. Though silent, its fists speak loudly through raw strength and loyalty to nature.

Nature.Magma Ground: Ignites the battlefield beneath enemy feet with {debuffimg} {fire} and {debuffimg} {lightning}. The earth boils with elemental vengeance.

Nature.Wild Friends: Call upon loyal creatures of the wild to restore your {buffimg} {vitals}, {buffimg} {dopamine}, and {buffimg} {endurance}. Their bond refreshes the soul.
Nature.Rain: Summons a heavy rain to soak enemies with {debuffimg} {water}, washing away heat and disrupting focus with nature’s downpour.
Nature.Protective Roots: Ancient roots rise to shield and heal, granting {buffimg} {vitals} and {buffimg} {endurance} to the caster. A living fortress of bark and will.
Nature.Aggressive Grass: Sharp-bladed grass surges underfoot, striking enemies with {debuffimg} {poison} and a spark of {debuffimg} {lightning}. What once cushioned now cuts.
Nature.Earth Strength: Tap into the unshakable core of the planet, gaining {buffimg} {rage} and standing unyielding in the face of chaos.
Nature.Healing Touch: A soothing palm radiates gentle energy, replenishing {buffimg} {vitals} and {buffimg} {endurance}. Nature’s embrace cures all.
